snippet: Tom Durkin, the voice of New York racing when the Saratoga meet is in session, pulled out all the stops when he went to watch his trotting colt, Coraggioso, race.
abstract: Postcard From Saratoga Springs; Tom Durkin, the voice of New York racing when the Saratoga meet is in session, and Joe Spadaro are the owners of Coraggioso, a trotter who has won more than $323,000; Durkin gives Spadaro the credit for the pair's success since joining forces in 2007.
lead_paragraph: Tom Durkin, the voice of New York racing when the Saratoga meet is in session, pulled out all the stops when he went to watch his trotting colt, Coraggioso, race.

headline.seo: Saratoga Horse Racing: Pink Pants, Trotters And an Entourage
headline.main: Pink Pants, Trotters and an Entourage
headline.print_headline: Pink Pants, Trotters And an Entourage
